annotations.summary: Patient reports poor diabetes management with unstable blood sugars and persistent fatigue.
On metformin twice daily but missing evening dose 2-3 times per week.
Frequent eating out with excessive carbohydrate intake.
Minimal exercise, walking 20 minutes a few times per week.
Morning blurry vision that resolves after a couple of hours.
Numbness in feet at night for past few weeks.
Last eye exam over a year ago.
